messages.message:
Hi all,

A gentle reminder - I’ll enable `readOnlyRootFileSystem` policy in our dogfood and UAT clusters around 9pm PDT today. Post that some of IB services may face startup/runtime issue due to this, so please keep a Watch on the services you own and resolve any issues on the go.

We’re planning to make IB services stable under this policy and ship it to our customers from the July release onwards so we have around 2 to 3 weeks time to identify issues internally.

https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1624301311353500

Note - If a service is failing and you’re not free to fix it right now then you can configure the service to use `tempdisablereadonlyroot` service account. _*This SA will be expire next Wed. and is only available in the dogfood env (not in UAT)*_
